description: Many of us have felt a certain quickening.  A manner in which circumstances seem to be pointing toward a winding up or, in other words, an ending.  It's the end of the world as far as Noah Brooks and his pal Joey Devon are concerned.  When Noah's brand new soccer ball deflates, only a couple hours before he supposed to bring it to practice, Joey declares the disaster, although small, to be the icing on the cake.  Noah's not so sure the world is actually ending, but he decides to take advantage of Joey's paranoia and have a little fun.  He asks Joey what he would do if he knew it was his last day on earth.  A bit of a hell raiser, Joey confesses that he'd destroy his house, and run around town smashing shit up.  But when Joey asks Noah the same question, Noah says his main concern would be getting off!  Joey agrees that would definitely be a great plan of action.  Since it theoretically COULD be the last day, Joey agrees to let Noah suck his cock.  Then the boys turn the heat up even more by jerking each other off, right in Noah's bed!  And you won't believe how hard Noah pounds sweet Joey's tight ass before they blow hot loads to usher in the last moments of human civilization.  And if it's all here tomorrow...they'll do it again!Enjoy!
title: Going Out With A Bang
